ComicInfo.Title: Better Harms and Gnawing
ComicInfo.Summary: Donna and Percy are captured by a roving motorcycle gang of humans. Donna is raped but Percy, being an imbecile, is left alone. Dan and Joey are shocked when they are discovered by zombies while hiding out. To their surprise, they find out that the zombies aren't attacking, just walking right past them and they decide to follow the mindless horde. In the conquered city, King Zombie discovers that all of his zombie troops are abruptly leaving...as if following some magical calling. Dan and Joey come upon the Voodoo Queen who seems to not only be controlling the zombie masses but now King Zombie as well.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-06-30 15:17:44. [CVDB302016]
ComicInfo.Penciller: Mark Bloodworth, Scott Parrish, Mark Bloodworth, Scott Parrish
